title: Strengthening Learning Design Practice: Project Design Based on Learning Behaviors for Higher-Order Learning

context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain stage-specific characteristics of learning behaviors (challenge acceptance, information gathering, meaning-making, feedback application) with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners can complete ≥90% of a social problem-solving project by sequentially applying 4-stage learning behaviors.
Learners can improve peer feedback utilization skills by ≥75% through peer assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
